title: Exploratory untargeted metabolomics analysis reveals differences in metabolite profiles in pregnant people exposed vs. unexposed to E-cigarettes secondhand in the NYU children's health and environment study.
abstract: Secondhand exposure to e-cigarettes represents a potential population health risk given e-cigarette's prevalence and their unknown health effects, particularly among vulnerable populations such as pregnant people.
journal: Metabolomics : Official journal of the Metabolomic Society
